page.title: 17INDUSTRY AND WORK
page.content: EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA Agriculture provides the greater part f employment in the area.A number of smallholders, however, augment their income with a second job.Quite a number of people work out of the immediate area,commuting to Shrewsbury or to a creamery and food factory in Minsterley,about 3 miles away.This number of commuters is increasing as agriculture becomes less labour intensive.There is a factory in Bentlawnt Imperial Electric, manufacturing high quality domestic fires, which sell nationwide, and distributing lighting and other electrical products. Hope valley service station employs 3 people in its motor repair workshop,filling station and small shop.There is also a number of self employed people.
